function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large number of people using outdoor recreational infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to close contact and shared surfaces","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people allowed to use the infrastructure at a time, promoting good hygiene and disinfection practices","Technologies":"Reservation systems, IoT sensors for crowd monitoring, contactless payment systems for entry","People":"Outdoor enthusiasts, general public","Owner":"Local government, recreational facility operators"},{"Description":"Advising individuals in quarantine to recreate outdoors with no range limitation","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through unrestricted movement","Mitigation":"Providing clear guidelines on safe outdoor recreation practices, enforcing quarantine restrictions, and promoting self-isolation during quarantine","Technologies":"Geofencing technology, mobile tracking apps, public health communication platforms","People":"Individuals in quarantine, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Substantial user base in Norway for STRAVA with recording of outdoor activities","Impact":"Potential for overcrowding in popular outdoor recreation areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Analyzing data to identify peak usage times and locations, promoting lesser-known recreation areas, implementing reservation or access control measures","Technologies":"Data analysis algorithms, GIS mapping, mobile app notifications, reservation systems","People":"STRAVA users, general public","Owner":"STRAVA, local government"}]}
